name: Gregors kitchen run
description:
The scene is that Gregor Samsa is at the brink of dying and suddenly gets the urge to to eat things from the kitchen. He now has to get to the kitchen to eat without being noticed by anyone in the apartment. But can he do it before he dies?

This game was made only for learning purposes and is not in any way made to earn money.

Gregors kitchen run was made as an highschool project where we were to create a game slice based upon a scene from the book The Metamorphosis by Kafka during a period of 3 weeks with two lessons a week. The game was made May to June 2018 in Gamemaker studio. The team included Mattias "Mau" Lundell,  Maja Lindén and Andrea Markovic.
